short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamic noise for images on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apply dynamic noise filter on images of current webpage. Open a page with lots of images. Then click "Apply Filter" to see. You also "Undo Filter" or just refresh to remove filter.
